About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

ALVIN REY BLANCO

Hi! I'm Vin, an IT Professional currently working in the Philippines specializing in Progress Programming and Web Development.

I am a person who enjoys the simple things in life, a devout Christian and tries to practice the minimalist lifestyle. I am a competitive person and believe in the old adage that humans should thrive and not just survive.

In my free time, I love to do physical activities such as long distance cycling and swimming. I also love listening to Original Pinoy Music (OPM).

I am a software development enthusiast and I hope that my work will help the world to be a better place.
